properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) TOTAL FROM REVIEW WHERE MEMBER_NO=?

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NM, ORDER_DATE FROM "ORDER" o JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? MINUS SELECT PRODUCT_NO, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_NM, ORDER_DATE FROM "ORDER" JOIN ORDER_DETAIL od USING(ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) NATURAL JOIN REVIEW WHERE REFUND_FL='N' AND MEMBER_NO = ?) a ) WHERE rn > ? AND rn <= ?
